summary: The Parallels: Redefining the NFT Landscape with ERC404+ Token Standard - The Parallels is a groundbreaking project that combines the ERC404+ and ERC721 token standards to mint unique NFTs. It introduces a new era of liquidity in the NFT space and offers access to an exclusive ERC721 collection. The project has a roadmap that includes phases such as website deployment, marketing campaigns, and expanding the team. The Parallels also has a FAQ section that explains the ERC404+ and ERC721 token standards, as well as the lore behind the project. For more information, visit their website and social media channels.
